selected_quotes: Our newest paper, just out on bioRxiv! Strong purifying selection on codon bias- accounts for most strong selection on…
interesting ms on variation in strength of selection in codon bias in Drosophila @PetrovADmitri
Biorxiv works! Before the paper is even sent for review, we got great comments @heatherEmachado htt…
Curious what people think of our argument that strong selection partly drives codon bias in flies.
Strong selection at the level of codon usage bias: evidence against the Li-Bulmer model.
